contentBlocks.title: General Pool Pump Requirements
paragraphs: Pool pumps must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Pool pumps must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool pumps must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool pumps must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Pool pumps must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Pool pumps must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool pumps must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool pumps must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Pool pumps must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool pumps must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool pumps must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool pumps must be installed by a qualified person.
